TopicTitle: [Question] Thrust to Weight Ratios for Kerbin, Mun, and Minmus

Articles.Content:
I would like to know the the thrust to weight ratios for Kerbin, the Mun, and Minmus. Basically how much thrust units are necessary to generate lift per 1 weight unit.

This would be incredibly useful for designing landers and knowing that they are capable of landing before facing the incredibly annoying prospect of actually getting them there.

Thanks!

Assuming you\'re directly dividing the thrust values by the craft\'s mass:

Kerbin: ~9.80665 (call it 10)

MÃ¼n: ~1.634

Minmus: ~0.785
